title: Where is Hecarim is he the new old sion and urgot
body: has never been played in the last two seasons i haven't seen him in ages what are you going to do riot bring our boy back

replies.body:
I don't know what rock you live under, i see a Hecarim at least 1 in 3 games, he's broken af too...

Pred + E + Passive = getting 1 hit before he even has a tri-force

He's actually really powerful. Nobody plays him because there  are "more enjoyable" champs to play. I had versed a Hec yesterday and he 1 shot my ass lmao. 

He's actually quite broken but he requires a lot of skill to know how to win fights. Everyone just follows the meta these days, nothing is wrong with him.
